bioconda.name: hifiadapterfilt
bioconda.summary: Convert .bam to .fastq and remove reads with remnant PacBio HiFi adapter sequences

biotools.summary: Remove CCS reads with remnant PacBio adapter sequences and convert outputs to a compressed .fastq (.fastq.gz).

bioschemas.name: HiFiAdapterFilt
bioschemas.summary: Remove CCS reads with remnant PacBio adapter sequences and convert outputs to a compressed .fastq (.fastq.gz).
